dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: I'd try to act normal and not raise any suspicion. Something like, "Hey everyone, I've been thinking about the latest crime scene. It's really puzzling. Let's work together to figure it out."

dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.message: "Alice, I appreciate your investigation efforts, but I also have reasons to suspect Charlie may not be telling the whole truth. Let's continue gathering information to ensure the safety of our village."

dialogue.speaker: Alice

dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.message: Based on the available information, I believe both Charlie and Alice have raised reasonable suspicions. Let's continue investigating together to ensure we have enough evidence to hold the guilty party accountable and maintain the peace in our village.
